Faint afterglow sings
cosmic microwave background
Timeâ€™s baby photo

large-scale structure forms
Filaments lace dark webs through
Clusters nod in time

Galaxies recede

nucleosynthesis dawns

dark matter hides in halos

neutrinos ghost through suns bright

Matter wins by one
baryogenesis now
Antimatter fades

sphalerons flip baryon counts

Across spacetime seams
cosmic strings hum, taut defects

axions drift as cold field dark

Curvature goes mute

isocurvature
